original_text: If your hand or your foot causes you to do wrong things, you should cut it off. You should throw it away. It is better to have only one hand or one foot and to have God's true life. It will be much worse to keep both your hands and both your feet and still do wrong things. Then God will throw you into hell, where the fire always burns.
korean_text: 만일 네 손이나 네 발이 너를 범죄하게 하거든 찍어 내버리라 장애인이나 다리 저는 자로 영생에 들어가는 것이 두 손과 두 발을 가지고 영원한 불에 던져지는 것보다 나으니라

sentences.original_text: If your hand causes you to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네 손이 너를 잘못된 행동하게 만든다면

sentences.original_text: or your foot causes you to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 혹은 네 발이 너를 잘못된 행동하게 만든다면

sentences.original_text: It is better to have only one hand
sentences.korean_translation: 손 하나만 가지고 있는 것이 더 낫다

sentences.original_text: or one foot and to have God's true life
sentences.korean_translation: 혹은 발 하나만 가지고 하나님의 참된 생명을 얻는 것이

sentences.original_text: It will be much worse to keep both your hands
and both your feet and still do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 두 발을 모두 가지고 있으면서도 여전히 잘못된 행동을 하는 것은

sentences.original_text: Then God will throw you into hell
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님께서 너를 지옥에 던지실 것이다
